channel.title: Snowboarding/Skiing music
channel.description:
Going to a place in North Carolina tomorrow, and I need some really good music for snowboarding/skiing.
I don't want to listen to like Bob Marley, Metal, really hard rock, classic rock
I prefer some really chill music, good techno/dubstep, ect
Post here, thanks.
